title: Winter's Song
description: Nothing exciting ever happens in Cascade Falls.Nothing that is, until I take a secret job at a secret club in a nearby town, and end up meeting a deliciously enticing secret stranger.But that stranger isn’t who I thought he was, and neither is my new job.It’s getting harder to keep my secrets from my best friend, and it seems he’s hiding a few of his own.Cascade Falls? More like Cascade of Lies.This book is a pre-novella to the first book in the Cascade of Lies series. It is intended for audiences 18+ due to mature content.
author: Cora  Flynn
